name: electron-chrome-web-store
description: Install and update Chrome extensions from the Chrome Web Store for Electron

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx tsc && npx esbuild src/browser/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/cjs/browser/index.js --external:electron --external:debug --external:adm-zip --external:electron-chrome-web-store/preload && npx esbuild src/browser/index.ts --bundle --platform=neutral --target=es2020 --format=esm --outfile=dist/esm/browser/index.mjs --external:electron --external:debug --external:adm-zip --external:pbf --external:electron-chrome-web-store/preload && npx esbuild src/renderer/chrome-web-store.preload.ts --bundle --platform=browser --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/chrome-web-store.preload.js --external:electron --external:debug

author: Samuel Maddock <sam@samuelmaddock.com>
